office_file_no.title: Office File No
office_file_no.content: Your internal file reference number for tracking this case.

notice_no.title: Notice No
notice_no.content: Notice/Form number from the department (e.g., ASMT-10/2025).

notice_date.title: Notice Date
notice_date.content: Date when the notice was issued by the department. System auto-suggests reply due date as 15 days later.

reply_due_date.title: Reply Due Date
reply_due_date.content: Deadline to submit response. System warns if approaching or overdue (amber for <7 days, red for <3 days).

issue_type.title: Issue Type
issue_type.content: Select common issue or add custom. Check 'Add to Master' to save for future cases. Standardizes case categorization.

case_owner.title: Case Owner
case_owner.content: Assign to Partner, CA, or Advocate. Only active team members with relevant roles shown. Contact admin to add new team members.

priority.title: Priority
priority.content: Set urgency level (High/Medium/Low) to help with workload prioritization.

current_stage.title: Authority Level
current_stage.content: The current position in the legal hierarchy - determines appeal routes and timeline tracking.

matter_type.title: Matter Type
matter_type.content: Type of assessment proceeding (only for Assessment stage).

period.title: Period
period.content: Tax period under dispute (e.g., Q1 FY2024-25, Apr-Jun 2024).

tax_demand.title: Tax Demand
tax_demand.content: Tax amount disputed in the notice.

notice_number.title: Notice Number
notice_number.content: The unique reference number from the GST notice (e.g., ZA270325006940Y).

form_type.title: Form Type
form_type.content: Type of GST form/notice received (e.g., DRC-01 for Show Cause Notice, ASMT-10 for assessment notice).

section_invoked.title: Section Invoked
section_invoked.content: GST Act section cited in the notice (e.g., Section 73 for normal assessment, Section 74 for fraud cases).

financial_year.title: Financial Year
financial_year.content: FY covered by the notice (e.g., FY 2024-25).

authority.title: Legal Forum / Issuing Authority
authority.content: The authority/court issuing the notice and handling this case. Determines jurisdiction and appeal routes.

city.title: City
city.content: City for jurisdiction determination (mandatory for legal proceedings).

specific_officer.title: Specific Officer Name
specific_officer.content: Name and designation of officer handling your case (optional).

jurisdictional_commissionerate.title: GST Commissionerate
jurisdictional_commissionerate.content: The GST commissionerate with jurisdiction over this case.

department_location.title: Office Location
department_location.content: Physical location of the department office handling this case.
